title: Russian gov't affected 18th, 19th c. econ develop

content.question:
Directions: The suggested planning and writing time for the question below is 35 minutes. Make sure that you are best prepared to answer the question thoroughly in the time permitted. You should spend 5 minutes organizing or outlining your answer.

Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

To what extent did the structure of Russian government and society affect its economic development in the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries?

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
